trans-unit.target: TEXT_REGNOR4GARIK_00597_RHENREN_000_000<tab>Can I interest you in some rock wrigglers? Plump, juicy, and wriggly! No? Is there something else I can help you with?
TEXT_REGNOR4GARIK_00597_RHENREN_000_010<tab>Very dark, very cool, the nights are. A good time for traveling, but a good time for flesh-eating predators, too!

TEXT_REGNOR4GARIK_00597_RHENREN_000_020<tab>Easier to see where you are going with all this Light, it is true. Still, no one needs <var 1A 02 /var>this<var 1A 01 /var> much Light, do they? Especially when you have Rhen Ren's advice to guide you!
TEXT_REGNOR4GARIK_00597_RHENREN_000_030<tab>Light and dark, night and day. All is in perfect balance! Happy times are here, but we must still be careful when crossing the desert.

TEXT_REGNOR4GARIK_00597_RHENREN_000_100<tab>I am what we call a “middle Mord” between Twine and the Crystalline Mean. The Crystarium is too far away for most of the miners, so I buy their gemstones and ore and sell them for a higher price!
TEXT_REGNOR4GARIK_00597_RHENREN_000_101<tab>I only sell by the crate, so if you are looking for individual items, try the other merchants! They have many goods for travelers like you!
TEXT_REGNOR4GARIK_00597_RHENREN_000_200<tab>Garik was once a mining town. Until all of the miners moved out, that is!
TEXT_REGNOR4GARIK_00597_RHENREN_000_201<tab>They were kind enough to leave their houses for us Mord to use. And like we always say, “Waste not, want not!”

TEXT_REGNOR4GARIK_00597_RHENREN_000_202<tab>As you can see, there is not much here, but a lot of people traveling to and from the Crystarium pass through, mainly to rest or use our well. It is the closest thing this place has to an oasis!
